lead_paragraph: The attempted Christmas Day terror attack has cast a harsh light on Nigeria’s national security agencies, revealing potentially crippling lapses.
snippet: The attempted Christmas Day terror attack has cast a harsh light on Nigeria’s national security agencies, revealing potentially crippling lapses.

headline.main: Security Flaws in Nigeria Draw Notice
headline.seo: Bomb Case Draws Attention to Security Flaws in Nigeria
headline.print_headline: Security Flaws in Nigeria Are Now Drawing Notice
